description: Enable advanced web scraping, crawling, and content extraction with support for JavaScript rendering, batch processing, and smart filtering. Perform deep research and structured data extraction using LLM-powered tools. Monitor credit usage and handle rate limits automatically for efficient and reliable web data integration.

fireCrawlApiKey.description: Your Firecrawl API key. Required for cloud API usage.

fireCrawlApiUrl.description: Custom API endpoint for self-hosted instances. If provided, API key becomes optional.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_scrape
capabilities.description: Scrape a single webpage with advanced options for content extraction. Supports various formats including markdown, HTML, and screenshots. Can execute custom actions like clicking or scrolling before scraping.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_map
capabilities.description: Discover URLs from a starting point. Can use both sitemap.xml and HTML link discovery.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_crawl
capabilities.description: Start an asynchronous crawl of multiple pages from a starting URL. Supports depth control, path filtering, and webhook notifications.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_batch_scrape
capabilities.description: Scrape multiple URLs in batch mode. Returns a job ID that can be used to check status.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_check_batch_status
capabilities.description: Check the status of a batch scraping job.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_check_crawl_status
capabilities.description: Check the status of a crawl job.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_search
capabilities.description: Search and retrieve content from web pages with optional scraping. Returns SERP results by default (url, title, description) or full page content when scrapeOptions are provided.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_extract
capabilities.description: Extract structured information from web pages using LLM. Supports both cloud AI and self-hosted LLM extraction.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_deep_research
capabilities.description: Conduct deep research on a query using web crawling, search, and AI analysis.

capabilities.name: firecrawl_generate_llmstxt
capabilities.description: Generate standardized LLMs.txt file for a given URL, which provides context about how LLMs should interact with the website.
